column7: South}}</ref> aged 117 years) was the second [[Ruling Steward]] of [[Gondor]].

column2: Mardil Voronwë]], the first Steward to rule in Gondor. Unlike his ancestors, he and his descendants took a [[Sindarin]] name. He ruled for thirty-six years and was succeeded by his son [[Herion]].<ref name="South"/>
